titleStmt.title: A touch-stone for a communicant. Serving for the true triall of a mans fitnesse or unfitnesse to come to the sacrament of the Lords Supper. Very needfull and necessary for these times wherin people are more then ordinarily put upon the triall. In a dialogue betwixt a minister of the Gospel Zacheus a worthy communicant and Simon an unworthy communicant. By E.F. Imprimatur, Joseph Caryl.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Edward, fl. 1627-1655.

titleStmt.title: A touch-stone for a communicant. Serving for the true triall of a mans fitnesse or unfitnesse to come to the sacrament of the Lords Supper. Very needfull and necessary for these times wherin people are more then ordinarily put upon the triall. In a dialogue betwixt a minister of the Gospel Zacheus a worthy communicant and Simon an unworthy communicant. By E.F. Imprimatur, Joseph Caryl.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
